167.movie_plot: A barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his parents and his tribe whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his henchmen when he was a boy.

104.movie_plot: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

24.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

148.movie_plot: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

113.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
113.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

131.movie_plot: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

52.movie_plot: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

25.movie_plot: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hit man who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

156.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

19.movie_plot: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

93.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

51.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

95.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

21.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
21.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

134.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

108.movie_plot: In the 1930s, a tomboyish girl runs away from her guardian to join her single father who is 2,000 miles away, because there was work there.

124.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
124.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

146.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

54.movie_plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

101.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

159.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

32.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

89.movie_plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

71.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)
71.movie_plot: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

116.movie_plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

166.movie_plot: On his ninth birthday a boy receives many presents. Two of them first seem to be less important: an old cupboard from his brother and a little Indian figure made of plastic from his best ...
